title: Harissa spiced lamb with cannellini beans
description: This rustic lamb casserole is full of flavour, especially if made ahead, and the lamb is meltingly tender. Harissa is a chilli paste with quite a kick; rose harissa, which I prefer to use, is sweeter and less fiery due to the addition of rose petals. I don’t like my food too spicy, so this dish is mild, but if you prefer it hot just add more harissa and good luck!
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz lamb neck fillet, trimmed and cut into small pieces
2.5cm/1in piece fresh root ginger, finely grated
½ lemon, juice and finely grated rind only
400g tin cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
salt and freshly ground black pepper
